title: Drawing, "Poster Design:  Abstract Bird on Blue Ground, study for poster, "Quickest Way by Airmail"", May 13, 1935
medium: Brush and royal blue gouache, silver paint, graphite on heavy cream paper
markings: Verso, stamped in gray: DESIGNED BY/13 MAY, 1935/E MCK KAUFFER
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: An elongated, irregular royal blue triangle is superimposed and bisects a larger, almost equilateral, silver triangle with tip pointing down.  A blue horizontal line passes through the silver triangle above the blue triangle (parallel to the lower edge of sheet) and extends into the cream ground before terminating at an acute angle into the blue triangle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Poster Design:  Abstract Bird on Blue Ground, study for poster, "Quickest Way by Airmail"", May 13, 1935.
May 13, 1935. Brush and royal blue gouache, silver paint, graphite on heavy cream paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-898.
